channel-type.label: Nightmode
channel-type.description: Switch to night mode, a very dimmed brightness mode

channel-type.label: Whitemode
channel-type.description: Switch to white mode, which basically sets the saturation to 0 (turns off the color leds)

channel-type.label: Link Bulb
channel-type.description: Sync bulb to this zone within 3 seconds of light bulb socket power on

channel-type.label: Unlink Bulb
channel-type.description: Clear bulb from this zone within 3 seconds of light bulb socket power on

channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: Color of the LED. Bind to a Dimmer to just set the brightness, bind to a Color chooser for the full control and bind to a Switch for turning the led on or off.

channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: The brightness can be set in 16 steps for RGBW/White leds and in 64 steps for RGBWW leds

channel-type.label: Saturation
channel-type.description: The saturation can be set in 64 steps for RGBWW leds

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: White leds and RGBWW allow to change between a cold and a warm color temperature. White support 16, RGBWW support 64 steps

channel-type.label: Animation Speed
channel-type.description: The speed of some animations can be increased or decreased

channel-type.label: Animation Mode
channel-type.description: Switch to the next/previous animation mode of your RGBW or white LED. Bind this to a Next/Previous channel type.

channel-type.label: Animation Mode
channel-type.description: Animation mode of your LED. RGBWW leds support 9 animation modes.
